channel.title: Comments on: Improve Your Multitasking in Age Of Empires 2
channel.description: Learn and Play Age Of Empires 2 Just Better

item.title: By: Evilkevik
item.dc:creator: Evilkevik
item.description: I really appreciate how much effort and thought you put on helping everyone to become a better player the correct way, Thank you
item.content:encoded: I really appreciate how much effort and thought you put on helping everyone to become a better player the correct way, Thank you

item.title: By: Harry Flashman
item.dc:creator: Harry Flashman
item.description: Are you sure about the DPI setting? The best-known AoE2 player TheViper actually uses a DPI setting of just 400. One of the ZeroEmpires video recommends the same setting, just 400 DPI, for better precision when microing. I have only just changed my setting and I admit it feels weird, but I am going to try it out and see if I get used to it.
item.content:encoded: Are you sure about the DPI setting? The best-known AoE2 player TheViper actually uses a DPI setting of just 400. One of the ZeroEmpires video recommends the same setting, just 400 DPI, for better precision when microing. I have only just changed my setting and I admit it feels weird, but I am going to try it out and see if I get used to it.

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/beginners/improve-multitasking-age-empires-2/#comment-16">Jineapple</a>.
That essentially makes much sense Jineapple! As you said Ctrl+A+A is somehow cheating and unfair. Nevertheless, if you put it into practice against MQ(Multiqueue)... Multiqueue wins.
Jineapple, do you know why everyone uses those macros? the hotkeys in Age of Empires 2 are lousy and boring somehow... I am not sure if you have looked into SC2 hotkeys...Oh boy, those fancy hotkeys!! You can do so much and it's like the game itself is "Hotkey user-friendly". They woe me lol and I just feel jealous when not seeing such hotkeys in AOE2.
Bottomline, you are doubtlessly right about the fairness of using macros. They are unfair.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jineapple.

That essentially makes much sense Jineapple! As you said Ctrl+A+A is somehow cheating and unfair. Nevertheless, if you put it into practice against MQ(Multiqueue)… Multiqueue wins.

Jineapple, do you know why everyone uses those macros? the hotkeys in Age of Empires 2 are lousy and boring somehow… I am not sure if you have looked into SC2 hotkeys…Oh boy, those fancy hotkeys!! You can do so much and it’s like the game itself is “Hotkey user-friendly”. They woe me lol and I just feel jealous when not seeing such hotkeys in AOE2.

Bottomline, you are doubtlessly right about the fairness of using macros. They are unfair.

item.title: By: Jineapple
item.dc:creator: Jineapple
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/beginners/improve-multitasking-age-empires-2/#comment-9">GregStein</a>.
There's a simple rule of thumb for macros: One input, one output. So remapping a hotkey onto your mouse is fine. Ctrl+A+A is more than one input, so you shouldn't use a single macro key for it. It's true that this might not get you into trouble, but in the interest of fairness you should stick to that.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to GregStein.

There’s a simple rule of thumb for macros: One input, one output. So remapping a hotkey onto your mouse is fine. Ctrl+A+A is more than one input, so you shouldn’t use a single macro key for it. It’s true that this might not get you into trouble, but in the interest of fairness you should stick to that.

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/beginners/improve-multitasking-age-empires-2/#comment-13">OhBoiiii</a>.
You are absolutely right! That example of "killing idle vills" is sort of too much - It would take someone else 2 - 4 seconds to kill many idles whereas MBL can do that in less than a second...Unfair!
I am pretty sure one of these days. Scripter or an equally skilled developer would figure a solution to have long macros canceled or impractical... Then....
https://i.imgflip.com/1ztrlk.jpg
item.content:encoded:

You are absolutely right! That example of “killing idle vills” is sort of too much – It would take someone else 2 – 4 seconds to kill many idles whereas MBL can do that in less than a second…Unfair!

item.title: By: OhBoiiii
item.dc:creator: OhBoiiii
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/beginners/improve-multitasking-age-empires-2/#comment-9">GregStein</a>.
Well, theres definitely a difference between scripts and macros, and while macros are safe to use on voobly without any consequences, theres still some discussion to which point they should be allowed.
Obviously streamers are in the focus here, since watching the screen itself is often the only to figure out if someone is using macros or not. For example MbL got criticized for using "killing idle vills"-macros until he explained how he uses a combination pressing delete and scrolling through the idle vills with the mouse wheel. Imo macros (virtually pressing several buttons while in fact only clicking one) shouldnt be allowed, while extra buttons shouldnt be a problem at all.
Of course theres til now no way to detect macros, but iirc scripter once said that hes aware of that problem.
Nice to see u answering so fast!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to GregStein.

Well, theres definitely a difference between scripts and macros, and while macros are safe to use on voobly without any consequences, theres still some discussion to which point they should be allowed.

Obviously streamers are in the focus here, since watching the screen itself is often the only to figure out if someone is using macros or not. For example MbL got criticized for using “killing idle vills”-macros until he explained how he uses a combination pressing delete and scrolling through the idle vills with the mouse wheel. Imo macros (virtually pressing several buttons while in fact only clicking one) shouldnt be allowed, while extra buttons shouldnt be a problem at all.

Of course theres til now no way to detect macros, but iirc scripter once said that hes aware of that problem.

Nice to see u answering so fast!

item.title: By: Johnsnow

item.description: Thanks so much for this guide I have learned a lot of new tips I guest i need to practice osu since my main struggle is mouse control.

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/beginners/improve-multitasking-age-empires-2/#comment-8">OhBoiiii</a>.
Thank you, man! I am very happy to see interactions already starting in this post. I hope I understood your question well... Did you mean are they safe to use? If that was the question, then They are totally safe to use in Voobly, steam or any other platform. They are not considered cheats.
The "macro cheats" are scripts that do so much more than just queue units. For instance, just like in that post you shared with us - Those cheat macros would keep the town center queuing villagers all the time, monks auto-convert, archers move away from mangonels, etc. Not anyone can make those scripts.
Now back to the extra buttons. I myself use them It has been 3 years and Surely MBL does too. Because I could hear the clicks of his extra buttons in the stream.
The pinpoint of the extra buttons is to help you build army faster. That's pretty much it. They can't do anything else.
I hope I answered your question. Thank you again,
item.content:encoded:
In reply to OhBoiiii.

Thank you, man! I am very happy to see interactions already starting in this post.
I hope I understood your question well… Did you mean are they safe to use? If that was the question, then They are totally safe to use in Voobly, steam or any other platform. They are not considered cheats.

The “macro cheats” are scripts that do so much more than just queue units. For instance, just like in that post you shared with us – Those cheat macros would keep the town center queuing villagers all the time, monks auto-convert, archers move away from mangonels, etc. Not anyone can make those scripts.

Now back to the extra buttons. I myself use them It has been 3 years and Surely MBL does too. Because I could hear the clicks of his extra buttons in the stream.

The pinpoint of the extra buttons is to help you build army faster. That’s pretty much it. They can’t do anything else.

I hope I answered your question.
Thank you again,
